bookTitle: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Plot: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas is the best chronicle of drug-soaked, addle-brained, rollicking good times ever committed to the printed page. It is also the tale of a long weekend road trip that has gone down in the annals of American pop culture as one of the strangest journeys ever undertaken.
Setting: Las Vegas, Nevada (United States), Nevada (United States)
